tests: INSERT INTO qa_result (run_id, assertion_id, concept_id, details)
SELECT <RUNID>, '<ASSERTIONUUID>', d.conceptid, concat('Current concept (', c.id, ') with "perinatal" in any term not modelled with "Occurrence " = "Perinatal period": ', term)
assertionText: Current concept with "perinatal" in any term not modelled with "Occurrence " = "Perinatal period"
shortName: perinatal in term modelled with occurence
docRef: SNOMED CT Style Guide: Clinical Findings Section2.12 Occurrence
